rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like to happen by recognising complex regional pain syndrome as a life-long illness.

If you would like people with CRP to receive help with prescription costs you could start a petition about that:

https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/help-with-health-costs/get-help-with-prescription-costs/

If you would like the Government to fund an awareness-raising campaign about CRP you could start a petition about that instead.
